sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, Fragment } from "react"; import Head from 'next/head'; const JobDetailsPage = ({ id, data }) => { useEffect(() => { if (id) { const history = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('broswedJob') || '[]'); const updatedHistory = history.concat(id); localStorage.setItem('broswedJob', JSON.stringify(updatedHistory)) } }, [id]) const calculateTime = (createdAt) => { const now = new Date() const difference = now - new Date(createdAt) return (Math.ceil(difference / 1000 / 60 / 60 / 24)) } return {data ? ( {data.title} - Jobify
{data.title}

This is the share buttons

Company : {data.company}

Location: {data.location}

Post at {calculateTime(data.createdAt)} day(s) ago

Description: {data.description}

{data.how_to_apply}

) : (
Loading...
)} } export default JobDetailsPage
